plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: SIM card PIN is incorrect. You can attempt %d more times.
SIM card PIN is incorrect. You can attempt %d more times. If you fail again, please contact your carrier to unlock this device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: SIM card PUK code is incorrect. You can attempt %d more times. If you fail again, your SIM card will be permanently locked.
SIM card PUK code is incorrect. You can attempt %d more times. If you fail again, your SIM card will be permanently locked.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code_leui
plurals.item: PIN has been entered incorrectly %1$d times.After %2$d more attempts, you can only use the PUK code.
PIN has been entered incorrectly %1$d time.After %2$d more attempts, you can only use the PUK code.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code_leui
plurals.item: PUK code has been entered incorrectly %1$d times.After %2$d more failed attempts, SIM will be locked.
PUK code has been entered incorrectly %1$d time.After %2$d more failed attempts, SIM will be locked.
